<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Bright Lion](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=97)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Mwangi Expanse

</column>

You are a member of the Bright Lions and seek to overthrow the tyrannical reign of Walkena and free Mzali from his cruel whims. You’re experienced operating undercover and have had to be cautious of what you say and who you trust, lest you fall afoul of the god-king’s terrible punishments.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill, and the [Mzali Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Lie to Me](/Feats.aspx?ID=811) skill feat.
